item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Thank you for using the Fast Track Sites Blogging Technology System, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at sales_(at)_fasttracksites.com.

item.title: Updates
item.description:
The backend of the system is now functioning, as is most of the administration pages. We are currently working on adding extra features and working out a few small bugs.
We have also added in a form checker to the add comments page. Th....
